oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grandpa Jones Press Release
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Moeller Talent, Inc.; Offset printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A black and white negative advertising Grandpa Jones and containing a biography of his life and accomplishments. The text describes Grandpa Jones' childhood, the first guitar he bought, when he began using the name "Grandpa," his musical career, and personal life. The negative contains a photograph of Grandpa Jones and would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.
